animeDescription: The story follows a group of baseball players who after having quit playing baseball are reunited by fate after enrolling in the same university. At the time the university did not have a baseball team, so the group who have previously faced off against each other throughout the years form a team and start playing once again, reviving their passion for the sport.  (Source: MAL News)
animeStaff: [['Shinohara Parako', ['Director']], ['Itou Noriko', ['Chief Animation Director', 'Character Design']], ['Akagi Hisako', ['Art Director']], ['Mikawa Eco', ['Original Creator']]]
